definition: Shapingba district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
a plain/ping, unit of area equal to approx. 3.3058 square meters (used in Japan and Taiwan)

sentences.english: With ChinaWestDevelopment in Chongqing it brings negative effects. Water insufficiency and quality are serious problems.
sentences.chinese: 沙坪壩區水量不足水質下降是一個突出的問題。

sentences.english: Chongda Road West, University Town, Shapingba District, Chongqing 401331, P. R. C.
sentences.chinese: 中國重慶市沙坪壩區大學城重大西路。
